segments.text: The operation in the lab is radioactive and dangerous , so work with care . Have you got ear muffs and gloves ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to wear ear muffs and gloves ? I am not used to working with them on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you have to . It is a safety rule of the company . You could not only lose your job but your hearing if you don't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll go and get a pair of them .
segments.speaker: S2
